text: CLOSE Reports say Hugh Hefner's neighbor is buying the property, which is expected to set a record for the priciest residential sale in Los Angeles. Video provided by Newsy Newslook The Playboy Mansion in Los Angeles has 12 bedrooms, sits on five acres of land and comes with a cave - like grotto and a zoo license. ( Photo : AP ) The Playboy mansion, the home of Playboy magazine founder Hugh Hefner, is under contract to be sold to a neighbor, according to property owner Playboy Enterprises. Daren Metropoulos, principal at private equity firm Metropoulos & Co., which owns Twinkies - maker Hostess Brands, plans to buy the 20, 000 - square - foot house in Holmby Hills, a Los Angeles neighborhood near Beverly Hills.
